short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes academia and student portal more user-friendly. See attendance margin right on the official website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SRM Margin Check is used to check your attendance margins right on the official websites at SRM Institute of Science and Technology. Tailored for use with the Academia and Student Portal websites of SRM, this extension offers indispensable features to help you maintain attendance and track your academic progress effectively.

Attendance Margin Tracking: Easily monitor your attendance margin to ensure compliance with the 75% attendance requirement. Know precisely how many classes you can miss while staying within attendance guidelines.

Easy Marks Checking: Checking your marks on academia is so unconvenient with only the subject codes being mentioned besides your marks. With this extension it adds the subject names and also adds up all your marks for the subject for better clarity and convenience
